titles.title: Maritime Industries Relief Act of 2019
To provide duty-free treatment for the sale of used yachts, and for other purposes.
Maritime Industries Relief Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Maritime Industries Relief Act of 2019
This bill exempts from duty pre-owned yachts offered for sale or sold in the United States.
The bill shall take effect 15 days after enactment.
